detectors.description:

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthsToken.sol#10)

	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthsToken.sol#11)

	- EthsToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthsToken.sol#71-75)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
